subject: Re: [junit] How can I write test case before write concrete cless
msgSnippet: ... Please Google Abstract Test Cases or Contract tests . -- J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger Diaspar Software Services http://www.diasparsoftware.com 2005 Gordon
messageBody:
Weiming Yin wrote:
> I designed some interfaces about my application
> Now I want to write some unit test case for test these interfaces.
> But I have no concrete class, how can I write the test case. The
> constructor is a problem.
> I can use Factory pattern to solve the problem.
> Is there any other method to build these cases?
> I don't want to so much FACTORY.

Please Google "Abstract Test Cases" or "Contract tests".
--
J. B. (Joe) Rainsberger
Diaspar Software Services
http://www.diasparsoftware.com
2005 Gordon Pask Award Winner for contribution to Agile practice
Author, JUnit Recipes: Practical Methods for Programmer Testing
